summary: Project to add a secured admin panel (Internet Identity) for managing users and orders, plus basic SEO applied across all pages.
architectural_notes: Admin panel must require Internet Identity authentication.
Basic SEO should be applied site-wide (all pages).
known_issues: Admin panel page/button does not appear; admin panel currently not working/accessible.

existing_features.title: Rebuild the Admin Panel entry flow so the Admin Panel button and page are reliably reachable: show an admin navigation entry for authenticated users even while admin status is loading, and ensure the admin page provides a clear loading / retry / access-denied state instead of appearing "not popping up".

new_feature_requests.summary: Add basic SEO across all pages (titles/meta descriptions/social preview)
Implement admin panel protected by Internet Identity authentication
Admin user management (full user fields incl. name/email/role; admin can manage users)
Admin order management (view/manage orders with items, totals, status, and all captured order/customer info)
Fix the admin-status check so the Admin Panel button can render and the admin route can be accessed without errors by implementing the backend method that the frontend calls (`isCallerAdmin`).

projectName: Rebuild and fix Admin Panel visibility and routing (button + page)
